023
024package org.opt4j.operators.crossover;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.common.random.Rand;
027import org.opt4j.core.genotype.BooleanGenotype;
028import org.opt4j.core.start.Constant;
029
030import com.google.inject.Inject;
031
032/**
033 * Crossover for the {@link BooleanGenotype}. The crossover is done on {@code x}
034 * points.
035 * 
036 * @author lukasiewycz
037 * 
038 */
039public class CrossoverBooleanXPoint extends CrossoverListXPoint<BooleanGenotype> implements CrossoverBoolean {
040
041        /**
042         * Constructs a {@link CrossoverBooleanXPoint}.
043         * 
044         * @param x
045         *            the number of crossover points
046         * @param random
047         *            the random number generator
048         */
049        @Inject
050        public CrossoverBooleanXPoint(@Constant(value = "x", namespace = CrossoverBooleanXPoint.class) int x, Rand random) {
051                super(x, random);
052        }
053
054}
